Engine¶

class engine.Engine[source]¶

Bases: object

Game engine.

BRAINS: Final[dict[Strategy, Brain]] = {Strategy.MINMAX: <ai.AlphaBetaPruner object>, Strategy.RANDOM: <ai.Random object>}¶

Map for strategies and the respective brain.

DEFAULT_NUM_THREADS: Final[int] = 10¶

Default value for option NumThreads.

DEFAULT_STRATEGY_BLACK: Final[Strategy] = 'Minmax'¶

Default value for option StrategyBlack.

DEFAULT_STRATEGY_WHITE: Final[Strategy] = 'Minmax'¶

Default value for option StrategyWhite.

MAX_NUM_THREADS: Final[int] = 20¶

Maximum value for option NumThreads.

MIN_NUM_THREADS: Final[int] = 1¶

Minimum value for option NumThreads.

OPTION_TYPES: Final[dict[Option, OptionType]] = {Option.NUM_THREADS: OptionType.INT, Option.STRATEGY_BLACK: OptionType.ENUM, Option.STRATEGY_WHITE: OptionType.ENUM}¶

Map for options and their type.

VERSION: Final[str] = '1.2.0'¶

Engine version.

Handles ‘bestmove’ command with arguments.
